channel.title: Skills
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
I've been thinking about skills lately. My question was what would players prefer, getting the skills in one certain training spot or spread them across the world? They would only get the normal teleports, varrock tele, lumbridge tele, ... with the correct magic level and runes. I'm really interested in what you guys think about this.
Thanks in advance, Halflive9

item.title: Skills
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

well if your speaking as if ,why dont you make it where u have to go all ovwer the world but for a ex have it where u can rc in more then 1 area for the same rune or more then 1 area for summoning…multiple areas means ppl will stay interested if theres more areas to select from .would u wanna rc when u have like 500 ppl in the same insance as u trying to rc or have multiple areas soo ur players wont all have to be in one area

Read full topic

item.title: Skills
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:1, topic:527660”]Dear moparscapers,

I’ve been thinking about skills lately. My question was what would players prefer, getting the skills in one certain training spot or spread them across the world? They would only get the normal teleports, varrock tele, lumbridge tele, … with the correct magic level and runes. I’m really interested in what you guys think about this.

Thanks in advance,
Halflive9[/quote]

If you had all of the teleport options like in actual rs, then the all over the map thing would not be bad. But you also would need an expansive player base to keep entertainment there.
You are probably not likely to have fairy rings, necklace teleports, Spell-ports, and other forms of legit transportation, (Like minecarts) But if i saw something with all of these working sucessfully in sync, i would be impressed (:

Read full topic

I always disliked how there was only “one training area” for a skill.
